name: Crash & Drive
description:
For ScoreSpaceJam #17

Sadly I wasn't able to add Sound Effects, Online Scoreboard or Music to the game due to the time (I started 24 hours late...).

I wasn't able to add coins to collect for a better score, so the score is just the killed enemies + the time needed. 

But all in all I had a lot of fun making it and I will update the game in the future :)
